sentence: KELLY GETS SINEMA’S BACK — Sen. MARK KELLY (D-Ariz.) defended his fellow Democrat and delegation mate KYRSTEN SINEMA on Tuesday, saying he doesn’t agree with his state party’s move to censure her, the Arizona Republic reports.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Ominous signs for Ukraine

sentence: The National Republican Senatorial Committee telling us senators from these states will be on defense, saying -- quote -- "Mark Kelly, Raphael Warnock, Maggie Hassan, Catherine Cortez Masto, and Michael Bennet will have to spend the rest of the year explaining to voters why they supported the failed Biden agenda that made their lives more expensive.
title: 'Your World' on US response to growing Russian aggression towards Ukraine

sentence: And Democratic allies of the Biden administration — from Senate Majority Whip DICK DURBIN (Ill.) to swing-state freshman Sen. MARK KELLY (Ariz.) — continue to push back against Zelenskyy’s desired fighter jet transfer.
